recipe.name: Gooey Butter Cake
recipe.notes: Gooey + Butter == Good Times, so it sounds.The recipe comes from Kroger brand cream cheese, whereupon it recommends Kroger everything, naturally, including the afformentioned puddingles cake mix.  I consider this a nearly mythical ingredient as I've been unable to heretofore find it, needing it also for "Herk's Coffee Cake".When I find some, I will store it up in pre-millenial qualities.
recipe.preparation: mix together cake mix, butter and 1 egg until it reaches dough thickness.  Butter a 9x13" pan and press cake mixture into bottom.  Retain 1/2 cup powdered sugar and mix cream cheese,  remaing powdered sugar and remaining 2 eggs until thoroughly mixed and top cake mixture.  Bake at 350F for 30-35 minutes and top with powdered sugar
